title: Admin Login Success with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that admin can log in successfully with correct credentials and session is maintained securely.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input valid admin username/email and password
Click the login button
Check that login is successful and user is redirected to the dashboard
Verify session is maintained securely (e.g. token stored properly, session expiration handled)

title: Admin Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login fails with incorrect username or password and appropriate error message is displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Input invalid username/email and/or password
Click the login button
Check that login is rejected and error message for invalid credentials is shown

title: WhatsApp Web Session QR Code Generation and Display
description: Verify QR code is generated, displayed correctly, and updates dynamically for WhatsApp Web session connection.

steps.description: Navigate to the WhatsApp Web Session page
Check that QR code is rendered and visible on the page
Verify QR code updates or refreshes if connection is lost or after timeout

title: WhatsApp Web Session Connection Status Updates
description: Verify connection status reflects current state accurately after scanning QR code, including connected, disconnected, and reconnecting states.

steps.description: Scan QR code with WhatsApp mobile app to initiate connection
Check that connection status changes to connected
Simulate dropped connection
Verify connection status changes to disconnected or reconnecting as appropriate

title: Fetch and Export WhatsApp Contacts and Groups
description: Verify admin can fetch contacts and groups from connected WhatsApp Web session and export them as CSV files correctly.

steps.description: Connect WhatsApp Web session successfully
Trigger fetch contacts and groups actions
Verify contacts and groups are displayed accurately in the UI
Choose export contacts and groups as CSV
Check that CSV files download successfully with correct data format and content

title: Manual Addition and CSV Import of Contacts with Consent Validation
description: Verify manual addition of contacts and bulk CSV import work correctly including phone number normalization and consent recording.

steps.description: Navigate to contact management page
Manually add a contact with valid phone number and consent flag
Check the contact appears in the list with normalized phone number format and consent recorded
Upload a CSV file with multiple contacts containing varied phone number formats
Verify all imported contacts are parsed correctly with normalized phone numbers and consent information handled
If CSV contains invalid formats or missing consent, check errors are reported clearly and import is gracefully handled

title: Create, Preview, and Manage Campaign with Personalized Templates and Media Attachments
description: Verify campaign CRUD operations including creation with placeholders, media attachment up to 50MB, preview with personalized content, pause, resume, and delete.

steps.description: Navigate to campaign creation page
Create a campaign selecting WhatsApp Web/Desktop channel, define a message template with placeholders and attach media file under 50MB
Preview the campaign to verify placeholders are replaced correctly with personalized data
Check that preview renders text and media correctly without errors
Save and start sending campaign
Pause the campaign during sending
Verify the campaign pauses successfully and no further messages are sent
Resume the paused campaign sending
Check that campaign resumes sending messages correctly
Delete the campaign
Confirm campaign is removed from the list without residual data

title: Compliance and Ban-Risk Checks During Campaign Send
description: Verify that message sending respects opt-in consent, filters blacklisted contacts, enforces rate limiting, and mitigates ban risks.

steps.description: Create and initiate a campaign targeting contacts with mixed consent and blacklist status
Check that messages are sent only to contacts with valid opt-in consent and not blacklisted
Monitor sending speed and verify that rate limiting profile is respected and sending speed does not exceed configured thresholds
Verify ban-risk mitigation triggers (e.g. slowdowns or blocks) when limits are approached

title: Real-Time Message Queue and Campaign Reporting Accuracy
description: Verify real-time queue tracking, message send success/failure, STOP requests handling, and accurate campaign performance reports.

steps.description: Start sending a campaign
Check real-time message queue updates with current sending status
Verify message send success and failure are reported correctly in the UI
Simulate STOP requests from recipients or delivery failures
Ensure STOP requests and failures are captured accurately in campaign report
Access detailed campaign report page
Validate completeness and accuracy of message delivery statistics and recipient feedback

title: Group Management: Create Group, Add/Remove Contacts, and View Statistics
description: Verify creating groups, multi-selection addition/removal of contacts, and proper display of group statistics.

steps.description: Navigate to group management page
Create a new group with a unique name
Verify group is created and visible in the group list
Select multiple contacts and add them to the group
Check contacts are added correctly to the group
Remove some contacts from the group using multi-selection
Verify contacts are removed successfully
Check group statistics display correct numbers of members

title: UI Responsiveness and Theme Support
description: Verify the UI responds correctly across different device screen sizes and toggles smoothly between dark and light themes.

steps.description: Open the application on desktop, tablet, and mobile screen sizes
Check all UI elements adjust layout appropriately for each device size
Toggle between dark mode and light mode themes
Verify theme changes apply smoothly and UI elements remain readable and correctly styled

title: Error Handling for QR Code Not Showing and Lost WhatsApp Web Connection
description: Verify that error states such as QR code failure to display or lost WhatsApp Web client connection are detected and user-friendly error messages are shown.

steps.description: Simulate failure to generate or display QR code on WhatsApp Web Session page
Verify appropriate error message is shown indicating QR code display problem
Simulate lost connection to WhatsApp Web client after session established
Check reconnection attempts are made and error/informational messages are shown to the user

title: Validate Rate Limiting Enforcement During Bulk Messaging
description: Confirm that rate limiting profiles are enforced during bulk message sending to prevent excessive sending speeds.

steps.description: Create a bulk message campaign with a specific rate limiting profile
Start sending the campaign
Monitor outgoing message rate and verify it does not exceed the configured limits

title: CSV Import Robustness with Malformed Data and Error Reporting
description: Verify CSV import handles malformed data gracefully and reports errors clearly without crashing or corrupting data.

steps.description: Upload a CSV file containing invalid phone numbers, missing required fields, and corrupt rows
Check that errors are caught, relevant messages are displayed to the user, and valid rows are still imported

title: Logout and Session Reset Functionality
description: Verify that admin can log out successfully and WhatsApp Web session can be reset properly with all relevant application states cleared.

steps.description: Click logout button from the dashboard
Verify user is logged out and redirected to the login page
Initiate WhatsApp Web session reset from session management page
Confirm session is reset, QR code is regenerated, and previous session data is cleared
